org.qbroker.event

Class FileSynchronizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qbroker.event.FileSynchronizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventAction

    public class FileSynchronizer
extends java.lang.Object
implements EventAction
    FileSynchronizer monitors a source file on its last modified time and keeps its target file in sync with the source.

    Currently, it only supports the data source of http, ftp and file.
    Author:
    yannanlu@yahoo.com
